class_notes: This class will meet in person T/Th, with additional materials to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: This course provides intermediate-level training in spoken and written Chinese in cultural context, based on language skills developed in CHN 201. Attention is given to complex grammatical patterns, discourse characteristics, and discussions of cultural topics.
sections:
